'''The Only Way Forward Is Up''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing with crew member [[Afia_Manicato|Afia]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Travel a distance of 5 or more meters upwards with Blink on 5 different locations.</big>
